00036 #include "PlaneBasedCellKiller.hpp"
00037 
00038 template<unsigned DIM>
00039 PlaneBasedCellKiller<DIM>::PlaneBasedCellKiller(AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>* pCellPopulation,
00040                                                   c_vector<double, DIM> point,
00041                                                   c_vector<double, DIM> normal)
00042     : AbstractCellKiller<DIM>(pCellPopulation),
00043       mPointOnPlane(point)
00044 {
00045     assert(norm_2(normal) > 0.0);
00046     mNormalToPlane = normal/norm_2(normal);
00047 }
00048 
00049 template<unsigned DIM>
00050 const c_vector<double, DIM>& PlaneBasedCellKiller<DIM>::rGetPointOnPlane() const
00051 {
00052     return mPointOnPlane;
00053 }
00054 
00055 template<unsigned DIM>
00056 const c_vector<double, DIM>& PlaneBasedCellKiller<DIM>::rGetNormalToPlane() const
00057 {
00058     return mNormalToPlane;
00059 }
00060 
00061 template<unsigned DIM>
00062 void PlaneBasedCellKiller<DIM>::CheckAndLabelCellsForApoptosisOrDeath()
00063 {
00064     for (typename AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>::Iterator cell_iter = this->mpCellPopulation->Begin();
00065          cell_iter != this->mpCellPopulation->End();
00066          ++cell_iter)
00067     {
00068         c_vector<double, DIM> cell_location = this->mpCellPopulation->GetLocationOfCellCentre(*cell_iter);
00069 
00070         if (inner_prod(cell_location - mPointOnPlane, mNormalToPlane) > 0.0)
00071         {
00072             cell_iter->Kill();
00073         }
00074     }
00075 }
00076 
00077 template<unsigned DIM>
00078 void PlaneBasedCellKiller<DIM>::OutputCellKillerParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile)
00079 {
00080     *rParamsFile << "\t\t\t<PointOnPlane>";
00081     for (unsigned index=0; index != DIM-1U; index++) //Note: inequality avoids testing index < 0U when DIM=1
00082     {
00083         *rParamsFile << mPointOnPlane[index] << ",";
00084     }
00085     *rParamsFile << mPointOnPlane[DIM-1] << "</PointOnPlane>\n";
00086 
00087     *rParamsFile << "\t\t\t<NormalToPlane>";
00088      for (unsigned index=0; index != DIM-1U; index++) //Note: inequality avoids testing index < 0U when DIM=1
00089      {
00090          *rParamsFile << mNormalToPlane[index] << ",";
00091      }
00092      *rParamsFile << mNormalToPlane[DIM-1] << "</NormalToPlane>\n";
00093 
00094     // Call method on direct parent class
00095     AbstractCellKiller<DIM>::OutputCellKillerParameters(rParamsFile);
00096 }

00103 template class PlaneBasedCellKiller<2>;
00104 template class PlaneBasedCellKiller<3>;
